Strings.Text: On the other side of the broken \nglass is a small laboratory.{pause}{clear}The vegetation has filled up the \nroom and it's impossible to go {pause}{clear}inside.{pause}

The capsule has been broken and 
there are stains of the {pause}{clear}preservation liquid on the floor. 
The capsule was probably {pause}{clear}cracked by the ivy wrapping 
tightly around the it.{pause}

The capsule has been broken and 
there are stains of the {pause}{clear}preservation liquid on the floor. 
The capsule was probably {pause}{clear}cracked by the ivy wrapping 
tightly around the it.{pause}

The capsule has been broken and 
there are stains of the {pause}{clear}preservation liquid on the floor. 
The capsule was probably {pause}{clear}cracked by the ivy wrapping 
tightly around the it.{pause}
In the preservation liquid, there \nseems to be a body of a young {pause}{clear}man.{pause}
It's a device which controls the \npower for the intruments. Some {pause}{clear}intruments have been taken \napart and a few parts have been {pause}{clear}removed.{pause}
It's a work desk for the \nresearchers. Small tools are still {pause}{clear}left on the desk.{pause}
In the preservation liquid, there \nseems to be a body of a young {pause}{clear}man.{pause}
